author: cms-l1t-offline
body:
Do not merge.

This PR is a placeholder for now.  This is the complete set of changes that currently allow me to bitwise reproduce the results of l1t-tsg-v3 under 801.  It includes a revert of the HF TP scale change and a local copy of an HF TP conditions from pre6 into 801.  Obviously we don't want either of these, but I wanted to start from something bitwise equivalent, so that we are certain any changes in final version of PR are due to TP updates only.
title: Foward-port L1T algorithms (l1t-tsg-v3) to 81X.
